casebody.data:
JEFFERSON COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION, petitioner,
v.
PHILLIP C., et ux., on Behalf of Their Son A.C. No. 12-1252. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 701 F.3d 691.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
